article_title: Community Health Center planning to add second story in downtown New Bedford
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: NEW BEDFORD — The Greater New Bedford Community Health Center is planning to add a second story to its downtown location and could start work this spring, pending city approval, the CEO of the nonprofit medical organization said.Peter C. Georgeopoulos, president and CEO of the health center, said the second story would cover the entire first floor, have elevator access and feature a brick exterior similar to the current look of the Purchase Street location.“It fits in with the
article_metadata.author: Mike Lawrence
